text: Ndi Mulungu amene anakulengani inu amene amakupatsani zofuna zanu. Iye adzakonza kuti mufe patsogolopakepanondipokenakaadzakupatsaninsomoyo. Kodi chilipo china chilichonse chimene mungachifanizire ndi chimene chingachite zimenezi? Ulemerero ukhale kwa Iye ndipo Iye akhale zopambana kuposa zonse zimene amazifanizira ndi Iye
